CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Nova Exchange}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aether Market}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Price Index go below 1723 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {1701.44} index in {1960}, total value was {1255.22} index in {1955}, total value was {1637.90} index in {1959}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Price Index fall between 2415 and 2669 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Price Index exceed 3361 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {3437.97} index in {1972}, total value was {3989.15} index in {1974}, total value was {3702.83} index in {1973}.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1960 higher or lower than in 1968?
NC.A: The total price index in {1960} was {lower} than in {1968}.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1980, did the total Price Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1972 and 1980?
NC.A: The change in total price index between {1976} and {1980} was {smaller} than between {1972} and {1980}.

NC.A: The total price index in {1958} was {lower} than in {1966}.
